title: New: Elliot Moss – Slip
body:
Twenty year old **Elliot Moss** [impressed](http://admin.

crackintheroad.com/music/26125-new-elliot-moss-big-bad-wolf/) massively with two tracks towards the latter end of last year, and has now uploaded another track lifted from 2013’s fantastic _**Highspeeds**_ LP. _Slip_ moves slightly away from the Radiohead-leaning experimental-rock of _Big Bad Wolf_, and finds him fashioning out a more James Blake influenced sound, yet remaining as deeply immersive.
